name: Never Again, 2021
description:
THE Supreme Court has declared two provisions of the Anti-Terrorism Act of 2020 (Republic Act 11479) unconstitutional but ruled that the other provisions that were challenged by several petitions were constitutionally sound.


*Malinaw na sumasangayon ito sa layunin ng 37 petisyon laban sa ATL na protektahan ang ating karapatan sa pagpapahayag at pananalita.

You can download the copy of Anti-Terror Law at this link:
https://bit.ly/3gglxlS

Filmed and edited by Steve Manzano
Produced by Crossing Borders Projects
